about: Software engineer with 4 years of experience building web applications. I value simplicity in code and design, aiming for solutions that are both maintainable and delightful to use.
While I'm often utilized for frontend work, I'm comfortable across the full stack and work with whatever the project needs—and I believe in taking care of the codebase while doing it.
I'm a builder—I enjoy creating tools and solutions, whether it's what's needed at work or side projects that solve problems I care about.

items: Led frontend architecture redesign using Nuxt.js, building reusable abstractions and composables that enabled efficient AI-assisted development and reduced boilerplate code
Delivered backend features in Laravel with zero reported bugs from account managers and clients, despite returning to Laravel after an extended break
Collaborated closely with account managers and stakeholders to understand system requirements and clarify implementation details
Built interactive user interfaces with Svelte/SvelteKit for a system revamp, including custom reusable components and a CRUD generator
Refactored and maintained Telegram bot codebase, migrating from JavaScript to TypeScript with automated Playwright tests
Developed and maintained shipping integrations (J&T, NinjaVan, ParcelHub) and marketplace integrations (Shopee, Lazada, Zalora) for an e-commerce platform
Built FB Live feature for real-time product showcasing and sales
Personal portfolio demonstrating frontend capabilities by replicating LinkedIn's interface
Features multiple specialized chatbots for project explanations, Clean Code summaries, and career discussions
Serves as a testing ground for developer tools and utilities I actively use
Private family tree application for 100+ family members to visualize and explore their lineage
Treated as a freelance project with a family member as client, gathering requirements and delivering features iteratively
Built with free hosting (Netlify, Supabase) as a core constraint; includes secure login system (demo available with password: 'demo')
A timeline-based todo app that visualizes all commitments on a single continuous stream
Built to track the gap between what I plan to do and what I actually do, revealing patterns in consistency and habit formation
